at poverty that you would expect to find
I don't know in Somalia today and so

they say what do you want and we'll help

work to help people facilitate their own

This is an area called outside of Oxu.
It's in the countryside outside of of Au

really tall trees to block the wind
they started uh this started in 1986 in

they're growing things like tomatoes or

just out of this new new arable land.

that people go to and learn to upgrade
